item.title: Advance Card - A Power BI Custom Visual
item.description: Advance Card is a Power BI custom visual with more features than default card visual present in Power BI. It is built to overcome some of the limitation of the default card visual in Power BI. Below you will find some of the features of Advance Card. Prefix and Postfix Labels You can add prefix and postfix label along with category label. Prexfis and postfix labels are useful to append text to begining and end of datalabel respectively.
